## About the workshop

### Tasks and timing

::: incremental
1.  Pick one of the cases you would like to develop during this workshop[^1]
2.  Form groups of people who want to work on the same case
3.  Work on these tasks:
    1.  create a document with code and text (2hours)
:::

[^1]: A list of cases will be provided by organisers, but you are free to propose one and develop it, in case there is more people who want to join you.
